trans-unit.source: Provides a user interface to select and configure a <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma interface de usuário para selecionar e configurar um <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: FontEditor is a <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor> that provides a user interface for choosing and configuring a <xref:System.Drawing.Font> from a list of available fonts.
trans-unit.target: FontEditor é um <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>que fornece uma interface do usuário para escolher e configurar um <xref:System.Drawing.Font>de uma lista de fontes disponíveis.</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the specified object using the editor style indicated by <xref:System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor.GetEditStyle*>.
trans-unit.target: Edita o valor do objeto especificado usando o estilo de editor indicado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor.GetEditStyle*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor.GetEditStyle*>

trans-unit.source: A service provider is provided so that any required editing services can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: Um provedor de serviço é fornecido para que todos os serviços necessários edição podem ser obtidos.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que pode ser usado para obter informações de contexto adicional.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IServiceProvider> that this editor can use to obtain services.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.IServiceProvider>que este editor pode usar para obter serviços.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The new value of the object.
If the value of the object has not changed, this should return the same object that was passed to it.
trans-unit.target: Se o valor do objeto não foi alterado, isso deve retornar o mesmo objeto que foi passado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the editor style used by the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor.EditValue*> method.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de editor usado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor.EditValue*>método.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor.EditValue*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que pode ser usado para obter informações de contexto adicional.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> value that indicates the style of editor used by <xref:System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor.EditValue*>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref> valor que indica o estilo do editor usado pelo <xref:System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor.EditValue*>.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.FontEditor.EditValue*>
